summary: SummaryBaBylissPRO Nano Titanium Professional High-Speed Dual Ionic Dryer allows for customized styling. Turn Ions On to dry hair faster, reduce frizz, maintain moisture, and make hair smoother. Turn Ions Off for specialized salon treatments and increase volume and texture.
details: DetailsBenefits2X the Ions* for maximum smoothness and shineSpecifically engineered tapered airflow for fast and efficient dryingCustomized styling. Turn lons On or Off: On - Dries hair faster, reduces frizz, retains moisture and makes hair smoother. Off - For specialized salon treatments (e.g., keratin treatments, curl revival treatments), and increased volume and textureFeaturesHigh performance brushless motorExtremely lightweight, ultra-quiet, Long lifeDigital 3 heat/3 speed settings, effective for all hair typesTrue cold shot, locks in stylesIncludes 2 concentrator nozzles, with cool tip sides, straightening pic penetrates curly hair with ease, diffuser for styling versatilityNano Titanium technology distributes heat evenlyItem 2607639How To UseSee package for usage details.Pre-caution: See package for normal warnings related to high heat and electrical appliances.
how_to_use: See package for usage details.Pre-caution: See package for normal warnings related to high heat and electrical appliances.

reviews.headline: I would buy again
reviews.comments: Best hair dryer I have ever owned light weight easy to use and long cord.

reviews.headline: Tornado dryer
reviews.comments: This dryer has supreme power but it is kind of an awkward styled dryer and the tornado that comes out twists and blows my hair all over causing tangles.  Yes I know to go closer w nozzle but then the pull on my hair is hard because of the shape of the dryer.  I'd probably get something like the Dyson dryer

reviews.headline: I will be returning this dryer
reviews.comments: I need an ionic lightweight dryer.  So far so good. But no settings lock so constantly inadvertently changing settings while using including the cool button.  Also, rather than turning ions off you.need to turn them on every time you turn dryer on.

reviews.headline: Does the job quick!
reviews.comments: I like this because it does dry my hair fast, which is what I was hoping for most.  It has a lot of great attachments and settings.

reviews.headline: Very loud. Purchased earplugs to use it
reviews.comments: Expensive and loud but gets the job done with my thick hair.

reviews.headline: Not worth the money
reviews.comments: This blowdryer doesn't get hot enough to get the waves out of my hair kinky hair. Not only that, but the cold air blasts so hard that it blows my hair all over the place, making it messy and frizzy. I misplaced the receipt and likely wont be able to return it. Very didappointed with this purchase.

reviews.headline: Won't turn on.
reviews.comments: Received the first dryer from an online order, and it wouldn't turn on.  Exchanged it in store and the second dryer won't turn on either.

reviews.headline: Returned item
reviews.comments: Not worth the price compared to other blow dryers

reviews.headline: Not very hot
reviews.comments: At first i really liked it because it was quiet and lightweight. But the downside is it doesn't get very hot. Even my clients commented the temp wasnt very warm.

reviews.headline: It made my hair frizzy
reviews.comments: I have an Elchim blow dryer that does a very nice job,but wanted a smaller 2nd one.  It made my hair frizzy. Hard to handle with the buttons too.

reviews.headline: Great blow dryer
reviews.comments: Love this blow dryer. Super lightweight, drys fast, can give u a smooth blow dry. I work at a salon would highly recommend

reviews.headline: Defective
reviews.comments: received and wouldn't turn on.  had to return.

reviews.headline: Impressive power.
reviews.comments: The power in this dryer is impressive.  I accidently blew a picture off the wall.  Dry styled hair in five minutes or less.  No scalp burns or frizzies.  Love it.

reviews.headline: Meh.
reviews.comments: I bought this dryer when it was 50% off and still ended up returning it. It took longer to dry my hair than my old Sedu dryer, and also seemed to leave my hair feeling straw-like. I'll stick to old dryer.

reviews.headline: Lightweight but powerfull
reviews.comments: Love how lightweight and dries hair quickly without frying.

reviews.headline: Babylon's High Dryer
reviews.comments: Pushed this hairdryer on sale at 1/2 price!  My hair is not frizzy after using this dry!  Would highly recommend it!  ❤️❤️❤️

reviews.headline: Best Dryer Ever
reviews.comments: Blower is fast and the three heat options are great for blowdruing wavy hair. The diffuser is awesome. I love how lightweight the dryer is, makes during thick hair so much less of a chore! I wish I had made this purchase sooner because I love it so much!

reviews.headline: Doesn't turn on
reviews.comments: Would love to give an actual review of the product but it doesn't turn on

reviews.headline: Do not buy!
reviews.comments: Zero Stars: Bought two of these and they literally won't turn on. What a waste of time and money!

reviews.headline: Not good
reviews.comments: I really wanted to love this hair dryer since I haven't purchased one in over 15 years. It doesn't get hot enough. Blows too hard or not hard enough. My hair is fine and long and all it did was whip my hair all over the place causing knots. Makes an awful high pitched sound. Definitely returning.

faceoff_positive.comments:
After using this hair dryer for a few weeks here is what I think.
First of all, it is  beautiful! I love the color, size and design. It is small and lightweight compared to my old one. It comes with 4 diferentes attachments to cater to everyone's hair texture and style choices (including a diffuser). It is also quiet and very powerful.   The cool shot works very good and the buttons are very easy to
use. One of the buttons activate and deactivate ions for hair stylists professional treatments. It also states it uses double ions when on to dry the hair faster and make  it less frizzy. After using it 4 times I don't find that my hair dries much faster or gets less frizzy. In fact, if I use the ions button I find it makes my hair dryer ( not sure if it's because I have highlights and textured hair). I also have to point out I am using it on the medium heat option as my hair is fine. The other thing I dislike about it, (and to me it is very important) is that it doesn't have silicone or any type of bumpers to preven it from sliding when in use. (See video attached). This means you will have to turn it off every single time you put it down. The solution I found was to put a silicone mat I use to clean my brushes under it to present it from sliding around. None of this is a deal
breaker for me as it is less heavy than my older one but, I wanted to give my honest opinion. In the future, I would love to see bumpers on it. I am happy to have been able to try and to continue to use this hair dryer.
faceoff_positive.headline: Lightweight, Small and Powerful!

faceoff_negative.comments: I love the power and look of this blow dryer but mine does not blow hot enough and takes a while to dry my clients hair. Im not sure if I got a bad batch or what but I'm disappointed and will probably return :(
faceoff_negative.headline: Not hot enough
